Class OrderItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data.OrderItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class OrderItem
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This is the OrderItem Class. This class deals with every item which is able to be ordered.
